definitions.definition: the first letter of a name or word, typically a person's name or a word forming part of a phrase.
examples: they carved their initials into the tree trunk

definitions.definition: mark or sign (a document) with one's initials, especially in order to authorize or validate it.
examples: put one's initials on, initialize, sign, ink, countersign, autograph, endorse, inscribe, witness, verify he initialed the warrant

definitions.definition: agree to or ratify (a treaty or contract) by signing it.
